Room.Name: Phexton Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: You are midway across the Phexton Bridge spanning Ashton Gorge.
Room.LongDescription: The Ashton River tumbles over a ledge high overhead to the east, and falls to the bottom of the gorge, providing you with a breathtaking view of the great falls. Looking to the northeast you see the road splits and one part leads north around the mountain cliff, while another disappears under the the great wall of water.
